mapper.select: SELECT TL.*, NVL(WC.WISHLIST_COUNT, 0) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM TravelList TL LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CONTENTID, COUNT(*) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM WISHLIST GROUP BY CONTENTID ) WC ON TL.CONTENTID = WC.CONTENTID WHERE TL.CONTENTID = #{contentid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAVELREVIEW (REVIEWNO, EMAIL, NICKNAME, CONTENTID, REVIEWCOMMENT, REVIEWGRADE, REVIEWDATE) VALUES (REVIEWNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email} , #{nickname}, #{contentid}, #{reviewcomment}, #{reviewgrade}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO WISHLIST (WISHLISTNO, CONTENTID, EMAIL, NICKNAME) VALUES (WISHNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{contentid} , #{email} , #{nickname})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WISHLIST WHERE CONTENTID = #{contentid} AND EMAIL =#{email} and NICKNAME = #{nickname}
